name: Prison break (itch)
description:
Sorry if this description is short & bad, it's late, I wanna sleep, kthanx bye

Prison break is a short game about trying to escape the prison :)

This game was made in 1 day for the 7 day game jam "Unijam", (I joined a bit late)

I hope you enjoy the game!

Instr:

Mouse buttons to hack & loot

WSAD to move
